sections.heading: DAMAGESArt. 1994. Obligor liable for failure to performAn obligor is liable for the damages caused by his failure to perform a conventional obligation
sections.text: A failure to perform results from nonperformance, defective performance, or delay in performance.Acts 1984, No. 331, ยง1, eff. Jan. 1, 1985.
